trans-unit.source: This section of the tutorial lists the steps to configure an <token>request_response</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section of the tutorial lists the steps to configure an <token>request_response</token>.

trans-unit.source: There are two parts to an <token>request_response</token>: a <legacyItalic>request</legacyItalic> bridge and a <legacyItalic>response</legacyItalic> bridge.
trans-unit.target: There are two parts to an <token>request_response</token>: a <legacyItalic>request</legacyItalic> bridge and a <legacyItalic>response</legacyItalic> bridge.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyItalic>request</legacyItalic> bridge configures how a <token>bridge</token> receives a message, processes it, and sends the message to the destination.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyItalic>request</legacyItalic> bridge configures how a <token>bridge</token> receives a message, processes it, and sends the message to the destination.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyItalic>response</legacyItalic> bridge configures how the <token>bridge</token> receives a response message from the relay services, processes it, and then sends it back the original message sender.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyItalic>response</legacyItalic> bridge configures how the <token>bridge</token> receives a response message from the relay services, processes it, and then sends it back the original message sender.
